definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish

sentences.english: Using low pass filters before the readout device may also reduce bandwidth.
sentences.chinese: 在讀出設備之前採用低通濾波器也可以減小帶寬。

sentences.english: Total settlement of composite foundation still decreases with the length of column.
sentences.chinese: 但地基的總體沉降量仍然隨樁長增加而線性減小。

sentences.english: Effective measure solving the problem on decrease of rope is to use the steel wire rope with metal core.
sentences.chinese: 解決鋼絲繩直徑減小的有效措施是使用鋼芯鋼絲繩。

sentences.english: The increase of the deepness of the tap hole will reduce the flow on the bottom of hearth.
sentences.chinese: 死鐵層深度加大時，通過爐底的鐵水流量減小。

sentences.english: Will the first to use contraceptives, "Yasmin", can reduce the dose of their own?
sentences.chinese: 請問初次用避孕藥“優思明”，可否自行減小劑量？

sentences.english: This reduces the set of workspace changes shown in the synchronization wizard.
sentences.chinese: 這可以減小同步嚮導中顯示的工作空間更改量。

sentences.english: Other things being equal, the evapotranspiration rate decreases with increasing humidity.
sentences.chinese: 當其它條件相同時，蒸散率隨溼度增大而減小。

sentences.english: We must try our best to reduce the damage to a minumum.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須盡力把損失減小到最低限度。

sentences.english: In the end, some suggestions for reducing deformation of embankment were proposed.
sentences.chinese: 最後，對如何減小路堤變形提出了建議。

sentences.english: It will increase sharply with the decrease of the diameter of sieve pore.
sentences.chinese: 隨着篩孔直徑的減小，壓力梯度大大增加。

sentences.english: The optimized irrigation decreases the angle between flag leaf and stem.
sentences.chinese: 優化灌溉處理小麥旗葉莖葉夾角明顯減小。

sentences.english: Pile cap can reduce lateral displacement of pile efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 承臺能有效減小土體及樁的水平位移。
閃電和雷聲逐漸地減小了。

sentences.english: For the annular membranes, the concentric rigid inclusion make the maximal deflection become smaller than circular membranes.
sentences.chinese: 當薄膜帶有剛性中心時，能使薄膜的中心撓度減小。

sentences.english: With decreasing the film thickness, the maximum absorptance appears.
sentences.chinese: 隨着薄膜厚度減小，吸收率具有極大值。

sentences.english: Measuring the clearance reduction with a feeler gauge.
sentences.chinese: 用測隙規測量遊隙的減小值。

definition: to pull back/to shrink/to contract/(physiology) systole
(economics) to reduce/to curtail/to cut back/to tighten/austerity/tightening/crunch
(of sth that has been deformed) to spring back to original shape/(fig.) to rebound/to bounce back
